评论概述: There is something in the ring that is giving me an allergic reaction
评论详情: This ring is great. It's a cool design. Its tapered inside but if you don't mind it then you should be fine. However, I must warn you that there is something in the ring that might not be stainless steel.  I don't know if its the metal itself or whatever the black stuff is to make the design more clear, but for some reason when I wear this ring my finger starts to swell. I thought that its just my hands swell slightly through out the day and its just a me thing, but with my other rings this doesn't happen. Its specifically this ring. Then I was wondering that I might be allergic to nickel and that this ring contains nickel, but after looking at the item description I could not find anything that says that there's nickel or not so I have no idea what is my body having a problem with.  Its a shame honestly. Besides this reaction, this is a great ring. Just be cautious and if you get a rash or swelling just return it. Thank god that I didn't get a rash every time I wear this ring
It's my favorite ring by far and the quality is perfect! Definitely worth more than what I paid for, great price 👍
comes as expected for price
I dig it. The size was a little off(10 is more like a 9.5) but otherwise it fits well on my middle finger.
This is a great ring!  It's quality is something of a surprise.  It it thicker (more surdy) than expected.  The color and design is exactly as pictured.
Not an actual band as shown. It is tapered in the middle. Still a nice product
My skin broke and got stained. I always wear my silver jewelry all the time and this never happens, and this one ☝️ did this. Not happy at all!
